metadata.title: CVE-2022-25836 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: BluetoothÂ® Low Energy Pairing in Bluetooth Core Specification v4.0 throughv5.3 may permit an unauthenticated MITM to acquire credentials with twopairing devices via adjacent access when the MITM negotiates Legacy PasskeyPairing with the pairing Initiator and Secure Connections Passkey Pairingwith the pairing Responder and brute forces the Passkey entered by the userinto the Initiator. The MITM attacker can use the identified Passkey valueto complete authentication with the Responder via Bluetooth pairing methodconfusion.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023.01.10').
linux-aws package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lowlatency package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-oracle package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-raspi package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
